column1: Frederick Augustus' reign began on 13 June 1900
column2: when his father died. His reign came to an end on 11 November 1918
column3: shortly before the German monarchy was abolished on 28 November 1918.

column2: Frederick Augustus married Princess Elisabeth Anna of Prussia
column3: a daughter of Prince Frederick Charles of Prussia. It was a double wedding
